subject: Football
September 11 (2001)
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. changed its normally rigid uniform policy for this weekend’s games, which will allow players to commemorate the 10th anniversary of the Sept. 11 attacks.
snippet: The N.F.L. changed its normally rigid uniform policy for this weekend’s games, which will allow players to commemorate the 10th anniversary of the Sept. 11 attacks.
